p.p: A subset of the SNOMED CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes newborn blood spot screening result status.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK newborn blood spot screening result status subset with subset original id 61081000000135.
NB: This subset ID, 61081000000135, has not yet been defined in a release of SNOMED CT.

concept.displayName: Newborn blood spot specimen received
Phenylketonuria screening declined
Newborn blood spot screening programme, phenylketonuria repeat screening with further sample required
Phenylketonuria not suspected
Newborn blood spot screening programme, phenylketonuria not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected phenylketonuria
Newborn blood spot screening programme, phenylketonuria not screened for or screening incomplete
Sickle cell screening declined
Newborn blood spot screening programme, sickle cell repeat screening with further sample required
Sickle cell trait not suspected
Carrier of sickle cell gene mutation
Newborn blood spot screening programme, carrier of other haemoglobin type
Newborn blood spot screening programme, sickle cell not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected sickle cell trait
Newborn blood spot screening programme, sickle cell not screened for or screening incomplete
Haemoglobin S not suspected (by deoxyribonucleic acid), no other haemoglobin or thalassaemia excluded
Cystic fibrosis screening declined
Newborn blood spot screening programme, cystic fibrosis repeat screening with further sample required
Cystic fibrosis not suspected
Carrier of cystic fibrosis gene mutation
Newborn blood spot screening programme, cystic fibrosis not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected cystic fibrosis
Newborn blood spot screening programme, cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete
Congenital hypothyroidism screening declined
Newborn blood spot screening programme, congenital hypothyroidism repeat screening with further sample required
Congenital hypothyroidism not suspected
Newborn blood spot screening programme, congenital hypothyroidism not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected congenital hypothyroidism
Newborn blood spot screening programme, congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete

Newborn blood spot screening programme, medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency repeat screening with further sample required
Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not suspected
Newborn blood spot screening programme, medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency
Newborn blood spot screening programme, medium chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency not screened for or screening incomplete

Maple syrup urine disease screening, repeat screening with further sample required
Maple syrup urine disease not suspected
Maple syrup urine disease not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected maple syrup urine disease
Maple syrup urine disease not screened for or screening incomplete
Homocystinuria screening declined
Homocystinuria screening, repeat screening with further sample required
Homocystinuria not suspected
Homocystinuria not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected homocystinuria
Homocystinuria not screened for or screening incomplete
Isovaleric acidaemia screening declined
Isovaleric acidaemia screening, repeat screening with further sample required
Isovaleric acidaemia not suspected
Isovaleric acidaemia not suspected and other disorders follow up required

Isovaleric acidaemia not screened for or screening incomplete
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening declined
Glutaric aciduria type 1 screening, repeat screening with further sample required
